original_title: Cyborg Blue (サイボーグ ブルー)
overview: A lone man in rubber pants and leather jacket fights against an evil organization. His body has been replaced with internal mechanisms. When equipped with a special chestplate, he becomes Protector, a powerful cyborg fighter. When his friend is killed by the evil organization, he sets out to destroy the organization and its evil robots from around the world. Can he defeat the might of the world's deadliest robotic killers?
tagline: When evil targets his friends, he will give all to become the Protector.
title: Cyborg Blue (サイボーグ ブルー)
